Search by pressing the search button up top. For each result, you can see artist, date, venue, and some information about the source of the recording. 
\ 
\ The settings button allows you to search for shows in specific date ranges. Additionally, it lets you control the number of results a search should retrieve, and provides the option to have results sorted chronologically or by show rating. 
\ 
\ e-mail vibevault@gmail.com with any problems or questions.

The setlist for the show. Click on any song to play it, or select the triangle on the bottom-right side of any row for more options. You can download a song, share it any way that your device allows, or add it to the play queue. 
\ 
\ The controls at the top of the screen give you more options. You can vote for the show in Vibe Vault's rankings, or share the show. You can bookmark it for future reference, or choose to download every song to your device. 
\ 
\ e-mail vibevault@gmail.com with any problems or questions.
See what songs you\'ve downloaded. Select a show to see what songs you\'ve downloaded from it. \n\ \n\ e-mail vibevault@gmail.com with any problems or questions.
The dropdown menu at the top lets you choose to view shows that you have recently visited, or shows that you have bookmarked. \n\ \n\ e-mail vibevault@gmail.com with any problems or questions.

Displays the now playing list. The playback controls at the bottom of the screen let you control playback. The icon to the left of each song title allows you to drag the corresponding song to a new position in the playlist. The controls at the top of the screen allow you to vote for the currently playing song\'s show in Vibe Vault\'s rankings, to bookmark the show for future reference, or to download every song in the playlist. \n\ \n\ e-mail vibevault@gmail.com with any problems or questions.
See your history of shows, as well as any others you may have bookmarked. Click one to open it up. \n\ \n\ e-mail vibevault@gmail.com with any problems or questions.
A list of bookmarked shows. Click one to open it up. \n\ \n\ e-mail vibevault@gmail.com with any problems or questions.

Click on a song to start playing it immediately (and queue up the rest of the show), or long-press on a song to add it to the current playlist. You can download the remining songs or delete an entire show using the menu to the right of each show. \n\ \n\ e-mail vibevault@gmail.com with any problems or questions.

Vibe Vault will automatically fetch a list of every artist available and the number of shows that each has which are available. After that, simply clicking on a letter will show the artists whose name begins with that letter. Clicking on the artist will bring up the Search Screen, populated with shows from that artist.

Thank you for downloading Vibe Vault v4, and welcome to Android's premiere community for people who enjoy free and live music. 
\ 
\ In this update, you will find an easier to use search interface, more access to voting and social media options, and tons of other improvements, enhancements, and bug fixes. We encourage you to use the voting and sharing features so that other users can learn about your favorite shows and artists. It only takes one click (or tap). You can access the voting and social media functionality by using the buttons that appear on the top of the screen when you're viewing a show's track listing, or when you are at the now playing screen. The same options can be accessed by clicking on the small triangle in the bottom-right corner of listed tracks and shows. 
\ 
\ We hope that you enjoy the new version. If you enjoy our app, please recommend it to a friend, give us a good rating, or like us on facebook. Enjoy the music and feel free to drop us a line. 
\ 
\ -Andrew and Sanders (the Vibe Vault devs) 
\ 
\ e-mail vibevault@gmail.com with any problems or questions.

See voting results for shows or artists. You can filter by all time, weekly, daily, or newly added items. Click the vote icon when viewing or listening to a show to share it with others. \n\ \n\ e-mail vibevault@gmail.com with any problems or questions.
